item.title:
First poster for ‘THE IDOL’ has been released.
Premieres June 4 on Max.
item.author: FilmUpdates
FilmUpdates

item.title:
Simon Lööf has joined the cast of ‘SO LONG, MARIANNE’ starring Alex Wolff, Thea Sofie Loch Næss and Anna Torv.
Poet and novelist Leonard Cohen (Wolff) travels to Hydra to rewrite his novel. After some time on the island he finds the love of his life Marianne.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
First look at Zoe Saldana, Nicole Kidman and Laysla De Oliveira in spy thriller series ‘SPECIAL OPS: LIONESS’ from Taylor Sheridan.
(https://vanityfair.com/hollywood/2023/05/lioness-first-look…)

item.title: Priyanka Chopra Jonas and Sam Heughan say their upcoming romcom LOVE AGAIN is a tribute to ‘90s romcoms: “It is time for something heartwarming and uplifting."
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Pedro Pascal and Ethan Hawke in Pedro Almodóvar’s queer Western short ‘STRANGE WAY OF LIFE.’
Described as “a very intimate portrait of masculinity.”
